prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a purple anthropomorphic cat deity, muscular yet lean, confident and menacing expression, Egyptian-inspired attire, floating in cosmic background
feature_prompt: wrinkled skin texture, detailed eyes, sharp ears, gold jewelry, subtle scar details, divine aura
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, CGI, chibi, plastic texture, exaggerated eyes, deformed anatomy, flat lighting, low quality
